column4: does anyone know of a good email checker for ubuntu like this one http://owaislone.org/blog/gmail-watcher/ I've tried popper http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2010/09/email-notification-in-ubuntu-popper/ but I found it hard to setup I want one that will launch my pop3 mail {windows live mail} in chromium? basically I'd like gmail-watcher but for windows live. any ideas please and I do not use evolution or thunderbird
Evolution comes built in to Ubuntu
I do not use evolution or any mail clients only web mail
Can't help you there then, sorry.
